name: Video Gamers United Convention in Washington D.C. (Canceled)
blurb: VGU is a gaming convention for gamers of all genres and ages; we hope to bridge the gap between the game industry and the gamers.

rewards.reward: For only $1 we'll post an awesome picture of our staff holding a sign with your name on it while showing our undying gratitude on our website.

This reward will include the reward above, but pledge makers will also receive an exclusive VGU Pin. This item will not be for sale anywhere else at the convention. Sporting it at the event will show everyone you had a hand in making this happen!! You will also get your name listed on our supporters wall. When you come to the event you'll be able to get your picture taken next to your name!!!

This reward is a good way to show your support if you can't make it out for VGU-Con.This reward will get you all the above and an exclusive Backer's Badge AND a digital picture book with pics that we the staff snap during VGU-Con. If you do decide you CAN make it to VGU-Con, then you can wow the world by combining the regular Attendee Badge that you purchased with the prestigious Backer's Badge.

Be recognized for who you truly are...The Backer!!! Another exclusive item that won't be available at VGU-Con but only to it's supporters. This is an excellent way to attend the convention, you'll get a VGU-Con T-shirt, showing the world that you are...The Backer!!! As.....The Backer!!! you'll get all previously mentioned rewards as well as high fives from VGU-Con staff when you're spotted (and if they're not too busy) at the convention. High fives are not redeemable at bathrooms, near bathrooms, or eating locations :)

We can make you famous!! This backer will get all the above, and their name displayed along with a thank you for your support message on the digital screens at VGU-Con. There are several digital screens at the convention center and we will work to get you a time that your name will be displayed so you don't miss it. We'll also send out a tweet and post a Facebook message thanking you as well.

This is the same as the above, but if you send us your picture (clothing is NOT optional, its a must) we'll throw it up on the digital screens too with the thank you message. Guess who's swag just went up to a million!!!

Awwwe Yeeeah, it's the Swag Bag! Show you're support at this tier and you'll get a sweet Swag Bag with various promotional items from the vendors/exhibitors at VGU-Con. You'll also get a special program of events....why is it special, only because is has your name on it on the backers page! Only those that participate at this tier will get this program. You'll also get the backer's pin, and a VGU-Con T-shirt!!!

Let me ask you a question, are you a game developer; more specifically are you an indie game developer, even more specifically are you a 2 man team on an indie game company (or something like that)? Well how would you like to demo your game at VGU-Con? At VGU-Con we'll have a free to play arcade where you can set up a table with your game running!! Get instant feedback from our attendees, without spending the big bucks to get a booth! We'll supply the space, you bring a table, your games, and a winning smile. The limit for this is 10 but we may allow for more, so feel free to ask if this is no longer available.

I hate standing in lines, and if you're anything like me then you hate it too. If what I said is true then this tier is for you. Speed through to the front of the line with the VGU Fast Pass for BOTH DAYS!!! The Fast Pass is a badge that will get you into VGU-Con faster and give you a chance to be one of the first to experience what we have to offer. Along with the VGU-Con Fast Pass, you'll also get an awesome T-Shirt that is only available to the backers of this tier.

VGU-Con will also have a VIP lounge on site. The lounge will have video feeds of the various speakers and video game tournaments taking place on the main floor. This reward gets you a VIP Badge. It gets you through our doors faster as well as the luxury to sit back and relax, get away from the hustle and bustle of the con for a while in a comfortable setting. There will be food and drinks available. This is only for supporters 18 years old and up.
Do you want to attend VGU-Con as vendor? Here you'll get a vendor's booth, a 10x10 space, just the basics. Contact us for more details.
This is the same as the above, but along with the vendor space, we'll list your company logo listed on our website.

This is the best one yet, you can chip in with 10 of your friends to get 10 Fast Pass Badges to VGU-Con, along with 10 T-shirts for all you and your friends. The reward here is essentially 2 free passes to VGU-Con. It doesn't get much better than that...or does it???

Have trumpets that bellow at your arrival to VGU-Con. This is for real, we'll do it. Along with your grand entrance you'll get a one of a kind VIP VGU-Con Badge that will give you access to the VIP lounge, a chance to play in any of the tournaments, or celebrity gaming event, a T-shirt and reserved seating at all panel talks, and key note speaking events.
